text: Ennui is another word for boredom. Ennui may also refer to: *"Ennui" (sonnet), by Sylvia Plath *"Ennui" (VersaEmerge song) *"Ennui", a painting by Walter Sickert *"Ennui", Russian song in List of compositions by Modest Mussorgsky *"Ennui", song by Lou Reed * Ennui, a character from The Ridonculous Race ==See also== * Boredom (disambiguation)
title: Ennui (disambiguation)
